get_started_one: Hi {user_name}, I'm Tchok, and if you let me, I'll be your 💊 coach.
get_started_two: First, I want to thank you for trying out our early prototype of best and simplest tool to help you control your spending and fill up piggy bank.
get_started_three: Have a look at menu  below and let's get started.
bot_ask_category_topic: Thanks! I will filter and prioritise news coming from {location} before all other news.
before_location_msg: 📍Location helps me track and 🚨 alert you to the most relevant news around you. Would you like to share your location ?
get_started: 🙋‍♂️👋 Welcome back! Ready to get some Goya dose...
choose_category_text: I am currently tracking news across a few categories. Choose what interests you the most.
not_now_text: If you are not sure, just say Not Now
explore: 💪 Explorers are the best. They find treasures...
category_explore: 😎 Okie dokie. Here's the latest news/stories on {category}
fallback_message: Oops! something went wrong. 🙇‍♀️ I will get back to you, I promise...
greeting: 👋 Welcome back! The top stories so far...
about_goya: Goya (Thats me) is a 📰 news and 🗞 magazine bot . Its part 👫 human - part 🤖 machine, working 🕛 to deliver news and stories from you from around the 🌐, converted to short snippets, for reading while you 🚍⏱☕
no_stories_found: 😶 I don't have anything to tell you on  {topic}.
next_error_message: 😖 Sorry, I am a little confused. {next} doesnt seem to make sense right now. Try saying help.
more_error_message: 😖 Sorry, I am a little confused. {more} doesnt seem to make sense right now. Try saying help.
realtime_notification_message: ✌ Okie dokie. I will ping you as soon as a news breaks!
user_notification_alert_input_sorry_mess: Sorry you have entered wrong time format. Please try again!
user_reading_pref: 🙌 Cool. I will ping you everyday once with
user_reading_pref_2: . Now lets start the Goya ride...🎢
like_error_message: Sorry, I am a little confused. {like} is for what?
unlike_error_message: Sorry, I am a little confused. {unlike} is for what?
quit_error_message: Sorry, I am a little confused. {quit} is for what?
share_error_message: Sorry, I am a little confused. {share} is for what?
story_telling_want_topic: Please give me word to search a story for you.
question_intent_not_found_previous_conte: Sorry, can you please explain a bit more?
yes_intent_error_message: Sorry, I am a little confused. {yes} is for what?
no_intent_error_message: Sorry, I am a little confused. {no} is for what?
no_intent_sorry_message: Sorry, We don't have story on this topic.
quit_message: Wait there is more on goya!
share_message: 😍 We love people who share. Long-press and copy the message below 👇. Paste in Facebook or Twitter:
story_start_message: 📰 Bringing up {title} from {source} in our category {category}
news_explore_message: Goyabot tracks 📰 news in the following categories
stories_explore_message: Goyabot tracks 🗞 stories in the following categories
help_message: Hello there! 🙋 You can do one of the following for Goya
unsubscribe: Sad to see you go, you can subscribe me again by saying subscribe, Thanks

category_desc.sports: Latest news from the world of ⚽🏀🏈🎾🎿⛷🥈🎳

for_beta_user: Hey there! thanks for your interest. Goya is in invite-only beta. Someone from our team will get back to you shortly.
